defect_observed.value: Flap extension asymmetry. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

root_cause.value: Thermal cycling induced solder joint failure in electronic assembly

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Cargo Handling component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet

preventive_action.value: Issue technical bulletin to all operators

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 26/04/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 28/04/2023 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 29/04/2023 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 03/05/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Airworthiness implications assessed. Recommend issuance of technical directive for fleet-wide compliance. Date: 06/05/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Observation
b) Defect Observed: Flap extension asymmetry. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Thermal cycling induced solder joint failure in electronic assembly
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Cargo Handling component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Issue technical bulletin to all operators
d) Attributable Code: D - Due to features inherent in the design
Remarks: Investigation complete...
